name: mcp-manager
title: MCP Manager
description: Manage MCP (Minecraft Control Protocol) settings for Cursor and Claude. Create, edit, and apply MCP configurations with ease.
author: yeeed711

commands.name: index
commands.title: MCP Manager
commands.description: Manage MCP configurations for Cursor and Claude

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
